message: Local variable name 'e' must match pattern '^[a-z][a-z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Comment has incorrect indentation level 0, expected is 6, indentation should be the same level as line 36.
'}' at column 5 should be on the same line as the next part of a multi-block statement (one that directly contains multiple blocks: if/else-if/else, do/while or try/catch/finally).
